template.name: Snom 821
template.description:
http://wiki.snom.com/Category:HowTo:SNMP
The phone only supports the GET request of SNMP!
tested with snom821-SIP - Versions: snom821-SIP 8.4.35a snom821-SIP 8.7.5.17

item.name: Calls
item.description: The number of successful and unsuccessful calls

item.name: http check
item.description: Check the phone configuration website

item.name: Incoming traffic on interface (Bytes)
item.description: The total number of bytes received.

item.name: Incoming traffic on interface (Packets)
item.description: The total number of packets received.

item.name: Memfree
item.description: The free memory on the phone

item.name: Outgoing traffic on interface (Bytes)
item.description: The total number of bytes sent

item.name: Outgoing traffic on interface (Packets)
item.description: The total number of packets sent

item.name: Registrations
item.description: The number of registrations on the phone

item.name: Registration Status Line 01
item.description: Registration status of registration x (1..12) (works with v6.5 or newer)

item.name: Registration Status Line 02
item.description: Registration status of registration x (1..12) (works with v6.5 or newer)

item.description: The number of timeouts running (> V8.2.6)
